headline: Wedbush says Anthropic demos strong, software-replacement hype overdone
summary: Wedbush notes Anthropic hosted its Enterprise Agent event where the company provided the latest product updates that make Claude Cowork effective for enterprises. The company provided some use cases across different industries, including Spotify (SPOT) for reduced engineering time on complex code migrations, Novo Nordisk (NVO) for improved clinical study documentation timelines, and Salesforce (CRM) for reduced timelines in Slack. headline: 2 Cybersecurity Stocks to Buy Now for an Nvidia AI Boost
summary: Nvidia has partnered with Palo Alto Networks and Akamai to bring artificial intelligence-powered security to industrial systems. Both cybersecurity stocks are already delivering strong earnings growth, with expanding AI-driven revenue streams.

headline: PANW Is Down 19% But Its AI Security Bet May Change That
summary: One of the world’s foremost cybersecurity names, Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ:PANW) is down 21% year-to-date and 24% over the past year, sitting at $144 against a 52-week high of $223.61. Reddit sentiment swung from a bearish 35-38 during a nine-day stretch in mid-February to a bullish 62 by February 22, coinciding with a flurry of ... headline: 'Claude Just Killed Our Startup': This SF Founder Says AI Made Her Product Obsolete Overnight
summary: Ira Bodnar, founder of San Francisco–based startup Ryze, said her company's core product was effectively made obsolete overnight following rapid AI breakthroughs by Anthropic and Manus AI.

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Wednesday
summary: Workday's light guidance is sending the stock down big, and HP Inc. showed just how painful the memory-chip crisis is.
